job_tasks.phrase: you will help PostNL make great strides in data science and generative AI.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the role's involvement in advancing the company's capabilities in AI/GenAI, implying the development of related solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: You take the lead in developing innovative solutions, collaborating with experts and promoting technology in the data science community.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights leadership in solution development and collaboration, core software engineering activities.

job_tasks.phrase: You are the expert on software development in the team making you the liaison for of the PostNL engineering community where we share "best practices" and innovations in our business.
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly states expertise in software development and acting as a liaison for engineering practices.

job_tasks.phrase: you will be the first to test and work with new tools and techniques from the market so that PostNL's Data Science community can create even more innovative solutions...
job_tasks.justification: Involves testing and working with new tools to enable innovation, a common software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: This new team aims to act as an innovation hub for data science and as a benchmark for all decentralised teams and drive progress in new technologies such as generative IA.
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on driving progress in new technologies, which is a software development-centric activity.

job_tasks.phrase: As a senior full-stack developer, you will help create innovative solutions and functionality on Data Science platforms.
job_tasks.justification: Directly states the role of creating solutions and functionality on platforms, a core software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: You will take on the engineering part for the team, optimising code efficiency and exploring new, fast solutions.
job_tasks.justification: Highlights the 'engineering part', code optimization, and exploring solutions, all fundamental software engineering activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Automate security controls and build robust CI/CD pipelines, championing efficiency and reliability;
job_tasks.justification: Building CI/CD pipelines and automating controls are key MLOps/DevOps tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Explore new AWS services and optimise product performance through experimentation and testing;
job_tasks.justification: Mentions exploring and optimizing using AWS services, which falls under cloud platform usage.

job_tasks.phrase: Guide and teach colleagues, actively sharing your software engineering knowledge;
job_tasks.justification: Sharing software engineering knowledge and guiding colleagues is a collaborative development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide expertise in building and maintaining a code library,focusing on best practices and innovation;
job_tasks.justification: Building and maintaining a code library with best practices is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate on the development of AWS SDK solutions, pushing the boundaries of what is possible.
job_tasks.justification: Developing SDK solutions and pushing boundaries are software development activities.

soft_skills.justification: Taking the lead in developing solutions demonstrates innovation and ownership.

soft_skills.justification: Highlights collaboration and promotion of technology, indicating communication skills.

soft_skills.justification: Acting as a liaison and sharing best practices within the business community shows an understanding of business context and strategy.

soft_skills.justification: Acting as an innovation hub and driving progress indicates a focus on innovation and taking initiative.

soft_skills.justification: Guiding and teaching colleagues demonstrates strong communication and collaboration skills.

profile.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes traditional software engineering tasks (full-stack development, code efficiency, CI/CD pipelines, code library maintenance, SDK development) under Macro-Category A. While it mentions 'generative AI' and 'data science platforms', the core responsibilities are about building and integrating these technologies rather than developing the AI models themselves (Macro-Category B). The role acts as an engineering lead and liaison for the data science community, supporting their innovation. Therefore, it aligns best with an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the role being a 'Senior Fullstack Developer' with a focus on the engineering and integration aspects of data science and generative AI. The responsibilities listed are predominantly software engineering tasks, with AI/GenAI being the domain of application rather than the core focus of model development. The distinction between software engineering and AI specialization is well-defined in the ad, leading to high confidence in the profile assignment.
